DataElement.preferredDefinition: Number representing how many cigarettes a person typically smokes in a day.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to statistical calculation describing the central tendency of daily use of cigarettes.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Finely cut tobacco encased in a wrapper of thin paper and rolled for smoking.(NCI)

Concepts.definition: Finely cut tobacco encased in a wrapper of thin paper and rolled for smoking.

Property.preferredDefinition: The central tendency of a set of n numbers; lacking special distinction, rank, or status; commonly encountered.:Occurring or done each day.:Use; put into service; make work or employ (something) for a particular purpose or for its inherent or natural purpose.

Concepts.definition: A statistical calculation describing the central tendency of a set of numbers; used to interpret quantitative data.
A manner, or usual, or accepted practice of using something.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Determining the number or amount of something.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A natural number greater than 9 and less than 11 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of nine and one.: An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.: A decrease in the quantity of an entity.
